website_summaries.verdict: This stepper scooter is designed for kids and has 2 pedals to propel the scooter forward.
pros: Works with 2 feet like a stair climber
Can go up to 10 miles per hour
Scooter does allow you to coast
cons: Really for smaller kids, this scooter carries a max weight of 110 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Not good as I expected, but my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks cheaply made. Behaves quite well on flat street, but not that good on sidewalk if it's not flat enough. Not fast as I imagine. If you want to get a fast speed, you have to step very very frequently, you would soon get very tired.It's for my daughter. She told mr she loves it., but anyway I find she rarely play it. Usually she plays about 5 minutes and then gives up. By the way She is 42" and 40 lbs. She can play it well.
customer_reviews.author: YINFANG

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Issues...
customer_reviews.text: We've exchanged this Scooter 3 times before giving up. Each time a different problem. First, brake not adjusted properly, back wheels not spinning freely. Second, back stabilizing wheel arrived broken off. Third, brake not adjusted properly, every time turning would brake the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Gift - Priceless!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for my grandsons and gtsnddaughter. All 3 love them. The twin boys prefer ride them over riding their new Bikes. My granddaughter prefers to ride it Over her new Barbie car. All 3 were delivered on time and not Very hard to put together. Best present I have ever given (they have Enjoyed).
customer_reviews.author: Joe Joe

customer_reviews.title: looks good but it is junk
customer_reviews.text: looks good but it is junk, made very poorly, my kid can ride it on flat surfaces like a skate ring but she can not ride it up a slight incline on the side walk, I will be returning this
customer_reviews.author: P Earnest

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves it. He can outrun his brother's bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old jumped on and took off with no problems. Make sure to use a helmet on the kiddos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for autistic kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for our 8 year old son with autism. He is non verbal and has the balance issues that a lot of autistic kids have. Within a few minutes he was zooming around on it at a pretty fast pace. He loves it because he's not afraid of falling and can keep up with the razor scooters the other kids have. Definitely a musty have for kids with special needs.
customer_reviews.author: DawnM54

customer_reviews.title: I think it'd better fit a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful! It is so small. My 8 year old does not fit well on the scooter. I think it'd better fit a 2 year old. My 8 year old has a scooter so she's familiar with scooters, but this thing is cheaply made! I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loved this. Took her a while to figure it ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loved this. Took her a while to figure it out and had to remove a spring cause it was to hard for her to pedal. She loves it now and we've had it for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly a gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit! Took my 7 year old and 5 year old all of 2 minutes to figure out how this would work and to gain confidence. They absolutely love them and they are great exercise as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: BROKE ALREADY
customer_reviews.text: After using it only 2 times the handlebar springs broke and the petal pedal broke off. this is so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed because one of the small wheels broke off when my son opened the box for christmas 2015.
customer_reviews.author: Kamidjo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scooter. It's very durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scooter. It's very durable. But I would probably not buy it for a child that is older than eight. It's a bit slow for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: I am sure some child is enjoying the bike. It was donated to Toys for Tots.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Engberg

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun, safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge hit. My daughter loves taking this scooter out and riding all around the neighborhood. This is a fun, safe, and really cool scooter. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: bbcoach

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this. He rides it all the ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. He rides it all the time both inside and outside. The only downfall is him always dinging the bell. Get product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Very cheaply made. The handle you bend to secure handlebar height, broke on our first "bend". Peddles are rickety.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: FUN-FUN-FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 and 9 y/o-- they love these scooters! People are always asking where we got them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8 year old granddaughter. She loves it! So does her three year old sister
customer_reviews.author: Stimpy

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this! He prefers to the razor scooters because more sturdy and its different and fun
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The nut that secures the spring coil to the left ...
customer_reviews.text: The nut that secures the spring coil to the left of front tyre is missing. Just discovered yesterday when giving the scooter a thorough wiping. I will try to get a similar nut from a bicycle shop nearby. Hopefully they have one in stock to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kassim S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great workout for the kids while having a blast
customer_reviews.text: Great workout for the kids while having a blast!! My 9 year old rides this all over the campgrounds when we go!!
customer_reviews.author: 6packminus1

customer_reviews.title: The material wasn't to sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It was way too small. The material wasn't to sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jenine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's bday and he loves it! All his friends are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this thing and it seems very well built
customer_reviews.author: Fire Cop

customer_reviews.title: Very good for my 9-year-old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bell broke on the first day. The unit seems pretty solid otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Max A. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: I want one in adult size
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this. Purchased one in black for her brother once he realized how much fun it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this scooter more than her bike. Once she got a hang of how to pedal she was zooming around in no time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves Scooter
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved the scooter. He and his older brother have a lot of fun on it! Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Burger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Sent it right back. It was broken when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: MELODY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It's a little hard if you have an inclie but on flat areas it goes pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My niece like it, but she really wanted an electric one
customer_reviews.text: My niece like it, but she really wanted an electric one. I was more inclined to this because the opportunity for exercise, but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Marius P.

customer_reviews.title: Sounded like a great toy
customer_reviews.text: Sounded like a great toy, but my children never play with it. A traditional scooter would have been a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alk

customer_reviews.title: Very unique and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. My nine year old loves the scooter and rides all over with it. Gets lots of attention and people keep on inquiring about it. Fantastic exercize and lots of fun. My three year old loves to ride it and when adjusted he does very well with it, although it is geared for kids a bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old granddaughter loves it as does her 4 year old brothers.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma to 4 and counting

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. Only negative is the adjustable handle bar and extension stalk are not very stable. But that doesn't keep my five year old from loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth N Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 y/o granddaughter's birthday. She loved it - and so does her 7 y/o brother! Came packaged perfectly - and has had no problems so far. It's a different way to ride a scooter but gives them more exercise as they have to pump the pedals. Very sturdy and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: granny26

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is really well made and my little girl loves it. It's easy to pedal and goes pretty fast. Overall it's made of good quality materials. So far it has held up great and I have no complaints. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a good quality scooter for their children.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love this. Ages 3 to 9
customer_reviews.text: Omg. My grandkids love this. Ages 3 to 9. They have decided to keep it inside till winter is over. Rides on carpet or wood floor great.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter for my 6 & 7 year old girls
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter for my 6 & 7 year old girls. They love riding them, but it does take more effort from my 6 year old because she is lighter. These work better on a smoother road, so if you don't have good streets or pathways....it's going to be real tough. These are nice too because the handle folds down over the base for more compact storage. Love these scooters.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great concept BUT my 10 yo grandson is unable to effectively use it!
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE WEBER

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: A friend of ours got one of these for her granddaughter. We then got one for our granddaughter, and she loves it. When we ordered the scooter, the item was on back order. Except for the back order delay, we received the item in good time. It was packaged well, and assembly was quite simple, and only took a couple of minutes to put together. We like the way it folds up. This made an excellent gift for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old loves it for getting around the neighborhood and doing serious or fun tricks. We think it is good quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Reginald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the 7-9 year old to keep them scootering!
customer_reviews.text: An awesome variation to the typical scooter, keeping our 7 year old son moving. Very safe, sturdy, and easy to transport. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bike is well made, but too slow for an eight year old.
customer_reviews.author: brenda j. prince

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scooter was not as expected...not fast enough for my son.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: good idea.
customer_reviews.text: good idea...poor follow through on the design. got this for my 7 yr old's birthday and thought he would love it. the stepping motion is a joke-this thing might take a 90 yr old granny somewhere, but not an active 7 yr old! too much work for too little speed. get something else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: It is a great idea and we like the variety in ways to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and loves this bike. He prefers using it instead of his bike now!. It is a great idea and we like the variety in ways to use it. The hand break is a great idea. I do wish there was a bit more room on the board itself if you wanted to use your foot to power it. The fact that it folds up allows us to take it anywhere with us.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 grandkids for Christmas. They absolutely love it so do the rest of the kids in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: paul455

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Akieva L. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED FOR MY 6 YR OLD GRANDAUGHTER..
customer_reviews.text: I WAS TOLD BY MY ADULT SON THAT WHEN HE UNPACKED THE SCOOTER HE HAD TO WORK ON IT... FOR 20 MINUTES...POUNDING THE BENT STEEL SHAFT, STRAIGHT, MANUFACTURER'S DEFECT, NOT CAUGHT, PRIOR TO BOXING, SINCE THERE WAS NO INDICATION OF DAMAGE TO OUTSIDE OF BOX... THE RUBBER HANDLE BARS HAD TO BE REPLACED, FROM WALLY WORLD. AFTER THAT REPAIR, BUT NOW, MY GRANDDAUGHTER LOVES IT... BUT U CAN'T FIND THIS SCOOTER, AT A RETAIL STORE ( OR I HAVE NOT ).
customer_reviews.author: NOBODY

product_meta.title: Ped-Run Kids Pedaling Scooter - Exercise While Having Fun
product_meta.description: The Bike Rassine Ped-Run kids pedaling scooter is powered by standing rider's driving force on dual pedals that operate much like the up-down motion of a stationary stair-climbing machine. The result is a riding experience that provides an enjoyable and fun free-riding activity with the benefits of an efficient, low-impact full body cardio workout that burns calories while you ride. Scooter propels at safe variable riding speeds up to 10 MPH max and comes to a stop with the hand brake. Scooter is 29" long by 11" wide by 40" high with a weight of 14.8 pounds; it folds up for ease of transport to 29" long by 11" wide by 9" high. Safely recommended for riders weighing up to 110 pounds maximum.
feature_bullets: Kids scooter: enjoyable, fun free-riding activity with the benefits of an efficient, low-impact cardio workout that burns calories
Health: rider propels scooter at safe Variable speeds with up and down motion on pedals, similar to stair-climber (up to maximum speed of 10 mph)
Motion: dual-pedal scooter propelled by standing rider's full body weight to generate the driving force; no kick ground pushing
Frame: weighs 14.8 pounds and folds easily for transportation or storage
Age: recommended for ages 6 and up; max weight 145 lbs.
